targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__time(time_column),
  value1
FROM
  metric_table
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_column)

SELECT 
COUNT(*) as "Success"
from media_health_monitoring_tool mhmt join organizations o on o.organization_id = mhmt.organization_id
where test_name = 'SIP Signalling' and $__timeFilter(test_time) and test_result = 'Success' and organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and host_name in ($HostName)

select count(failure_reason), failure_reason as "Value" from media_health_monitoring_tool mhmt join organizations o on o.organization_id = mhmt.organization_id
where failure_reason is NOT NULL and test_name = 'SIP Signalling' and $__timeFilter(test_time) and test_result = 'Failed' and organization_name in ('$OrganizationName')  and cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and host_name in ($HostName)
group by failure_reason

SELECT 
COUNT(*) as "Success"
from media_health_monitoring_tool mhmt join organizations o on mhmt.organization_id = o.organization_id
where test_name = 'Media Cascade' and $__timeFilter(test_time) and test_result = 'Success' and organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and host_name in ($HostName)

select count(failure_reason), failure_reason as "Value" from media_health_monitoring_tool mhmt join organizations o on mhmt.organization_id = o.organization_id
where failure_reason is NOT NULL and test_name = 'Media Cascade' and $__timeFilter(test_time) and test_result = 'Failed' and organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and host_name in ($HostName)
group by failure_reason

SELECT 
COUNT(*) as "Success"
from media_health_monitoring_tool mhmt join organizations o on mhmt.organization_id = o.organization_id
where test_name = 'Media Signalling' and $__timeFilter(test_time) and test_result = 'Success' and organization_name in ('$OrganizationName')  and cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and host_name in ($HostName)

select count(failure_reason), failure_reason as "Value" from media_health_monitoring_tool mhmt join organizations o on mhmt.organization_id = o.organization_id
where failure_reason is NOT NULL and test_name = 'Media Signalling' and $__timeFilter(test_time) and test_result = 'Failed' and organization_name in ('$OrganizationName')  and cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and host_name in ($HostName)
group by failure_reason

SELECT 
COUNT(*) as "Success"
from media_health_monitoring_tool mhmt 
where test_name = 'SIP Signalling' and host_name in ($HostName) and $__timeFilter(test_time) and test_result = 'Success'

select count(failure_reason), failure_reason as "Value" from media_health_monitoring_tool mhmt 
where test_name = 'SIP Signalling' and host_name in ($HostName) and $__timeFilter(test_time) and test_result = 'Failed'
group by failure_reason

SELECT 
test_time as "time", 
CASE WHEN test_result = 'Success' THEN 1 end as "Success"
from media_health_monitoring_tool mhmt 
where test_name = 'SIP Signalling' and host_name in ($HostName) and $__timeFilter(test_time)
order by test_time

SELECT 
test_time as "time", 
failure_reason,
CASE WHEN test_result = 'Failed' THEN 0 end as "Value"
from media_health_monitoring_tool mhmt 
where test_name = 'SIP Signalling' and host_name in ($HostName) and $__timeFilter(test_time) and test_result = 'Failed'
order by test_time

SELECT 
COUNT(*) as "Success"
from media_health_monitoring_tool mhmt 
where test_name = 'Media Cascade' and host_name in ($HostName) and $__timeFilter(test_time) and test_result = 'Success'

select count(failure_reason), failure_reason as "Value" from media_health_monitoring_tool mhmt 
where failure_reason is NOT NULL and test_name = 'Media Cascade' and host_name in ($HostName) and $__timeFilter(test_time) and test_result = 'Failed'
group by failure_reason

SELECT 
test_time as "time", 
CASE WHEN test_result = 'Success' THEN 1 end as "Success"
from media_health_monitoring_tool mhmt 
where test_name = 'Media Cascade' and host_name in ($HostName) and $__timeFilter(test_time)
order by test_time

SELECT 
test_time as "time", 
failure_reason,
CASE WHEN test_result = 'Failed' THEN 0 end as "Value"
from media_health_monitoring_tool mhmt 
where test_name = 'Media Cascade' and host_name in ($HostName) and $__timeFilter(test_time) and test_result='Failed'
order by test_time

SELECT 
COUNT(*) as "Success"
from media_health_monitoring_tool mhmt 
where test_name = 'Media Signalling' and host_name in ($HostName) and $__timeFilter(test_time) and test_result = 'Success'

select count(failure_reason), failure_reason as "Value" from media_health_monitoring_tool mhmt 
where failure_reason is NOT NULL and test_name = 'Media Signalling' and host_name in ($HostName) and $__timeFilter(test_time) and test_result = 'Failed'
group by failure_reason

SELECT 
test_time as "time", 
CASE WHEN test_result = 'Success' THEN 1 end as "Success"
from media_health_monitoring_tool mhmt 
where test_name = 'Media Signalling' and host_name in ($HostName) and $__timeFilter(test_time)
order by test_time

SELECT 
test_time as "time", 
failure_reason,
CASE WHEN test_result = 'Failed' THEN 0 end as "Value"
from media_health_monitoring_tool mhmt 
where test_name = 'Media Signalling' and host_name in ($HostName) and $__timeFilter(test_time) and test_result = 'Failed'
order by test_time
select * from media_health_monitoring_tool where $__timeFilter(test_time) and host_name in ($HostName)

list.definition:
select distinct cluster_name from media_health_monitoring_tool mhmt join organizations o 
on o.organization_id = mhmt.organization_id 
where organization_name in ('$OrganizationName')
list.label: Select Cluster Name
list.name: ClusterName
list.query:
select distinct cluster_name from media_health_monitoring_tool mhmt join organizations o 
on o.organization_id = mhmt.organization_id 
where organization_name in ('$OrganizationName')

list.definition:
select distinct host_name from media_health_monitoring_tool mhmt join organizations o 
on o.organization_id = mhmt.organization_id 
where cluster_name in ($ClusterName)
list.label: Select Host Name
list.name: HostName
list.query:
select distinct host_name from media_health_monitoring_tool mhmt join organizations o 
on o.organization_id = mhmt.organization_id 
where cluster_name in ($ClusterName)
